verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: Don Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: us] [ARG1: that he withdrew</p > < p > Iran was the worst deal he knew</p > < p > Before there were fears</p > < p > They’d get nukes in ten years</p > < p > But now they could get nukes in two .] < /p >

< p > Don Trump told us that he [V: withdrew</p] > < p > Iran was the worst deal he knew</p > < p > Before there were fears</p > < p > They’d get nukes in ten years</p > < p > But now they could get nukes in two . < /p >

< p > Don Trump told us that he withdrew</p > < p > [ARG1: Iran] [V: was] [ARG2: the worst deal] he knew</p > < p > Before there were fears</p > < p > They’d get nukes in ten years</p > < p > But now they could get nukes in two . < /p >

< p > Don Trump told us that he withdrew</p > < p > Iran was the worst deal he knew</p > < p > Before there [V: were] [ARG1: fears</p > < p > They’d get nukes in ten years</p > < p > But] now they could get nukes in two . < /p >

< p > Don Trump told us that he withdrew</p > < p > Iran was the worst deal he knew</p > < p > Before there were fears</p > < p > [ARG0: They’d] [V: get] [ARG1: nukes] [ARGM-TMP: in ten years</p > < p >] But now they could get nukes in two . < /p >

< p > Don Trump told us that he withdrew</p > < p > Iran was the worst deal he knew</p > < p > Before there were fears</p > < p > They’d get nukes in ten years</p > < p > But now they [V: could] get nukes in two . < /p >
